Title: Mon Oncle
Writer: Jacques Lagrange (artistic collaboration), Jean L'Hôte (artistic collaboration), Jacques Tati
Actors: Jean-Pierre Zola, Adrienne Servantie, Lucien Frégis, Betty Schneider
Plot: Monsieur Hulot visits the technology-driven world of his sister, brother-in-law, and nephew, but he can't quite fit into the surroundings.
Production: Gray-Film, Specta Films, Film del Centauro, Alter Films
